description: This file defines a LightningJS component named 'NotesHome' that renders the main notes interface, comprising a header, sidebar with notes list, and a note editor. It initializes state by fetching or creating notes and handles interactions such as selecting or creating notes.

classes.name: NotesHome
classes.description: A LightningJS component for the notes application's main interface, managing layout, state, and user interactions.

methods.name: onSelect
methods.description: Handles note selection by updating the 'selectedId' state.

methods.name: newNote
methods.description: Creates a new note and updates the selected note ID.

methods.name: enterHover
methods.description: Handles hover effect over the 'New' button by changing its color.

methods.name: leaveHover
methods.description: Reverts hover effect on the 'New' button.
